overview: Revenge is always a recipe for intrigue and in this tropical tale we are sucked into a story combining danger and a delicious serving of sizzling hardcore sex. A star studded cast including Diana Gold, Katy Caro, Justine Ashley, Sharka Blue, Jamie Brooks and Jemstone treat us to five scenes of first class fuck action set against some of the most tempting tropical locations imaginable.
title: Dangerous Sex
